lead_paragraph: José Mourinho was introduced as the coach of Real Madrid, which he said he was joining because of its “history, its frustrations of recent years and its hopes of winning.”
snippet: José Mourinho was introduced as the coach of Real Madrid, which he said he was joining because of its “history, its frustrations of recent years and its hopes of winning.”

headline.main: New Coach Mourinho Vows to Bring Real Madrid Success
headline.print_headline: New Coach Mourinho Vows To Bring Real Madrid Success
